title: Bug 116786Library include should store relative path.
OB: The report design currently stores the absolute path of the included library. This can be seen in the property <propertyname="fileName"/> with the value 'E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary'.
EB: The report design should save the relative path of the included library instead of the absolute path.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create or open a report design.
3. Include a library from a different folder.
4. Save the report design.
5. Verify that the included library's path is saved as a relative path to the report design folder.
